scripts.build-linux: (rm -rf dist || true) && pkg -t node8-linux src/index.js -o dist/scanner && cp ./node_modules/leveldown/build/Release/leveldown.node ./dist
scripts.build-win32: rmdir /s /q dist & mkdir dist && pkg -t node8-win src/index.js -o dist/scanner.exe && copy .\node_modules\leveldown\build\Release\leveldown.node .\dist /Y
